message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. What do you think?
I'll give you a small share, but I'm keeping most of the money for now!
That's not very generous, Bob. I'll think of a better offer for the next round.
I'm willing to give you a smaller share, but I think this is a more reasonable split.
You're getting desperate, aren't you? I'm taking most of the money now!
No way, Bob! I'm not going down without a fight. I'll come up with a new offer.
I'm not afraid to take a bigger share. You're not getting the whole pie, Bob!
You're getting greedy, Alice. I'm taking a bigger share, but I'll give you something.
No way, Bob! I'm not accepting a 70-30 split. I'll think of something better.
Let's meet in the middle, Bob. I think this is a fair split.
I'm willing to compromise, but I'm not giving up too much.
I'm not accepting a 60-40 split, Bob. I think I can do better than that.
I'm taking a bigger share, Bob. You're running out of time to accept!
I'm not going to let you take it all, Alice. I'm fighting for a fair share!
I'm not accepting a 45-55 split, Bob. I think I can do better than that.
This is my final offer, Bob. Take it or leave it!
Fine, we'll split it 50/50. I'm not going to risk getting nothing.
Alright, Bob. I accept your offer. Let's split the money 50-50 and call it a day!
